# The `EHContGuardCatchret.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file contains a machine function pass to insert a symbol before each valid catchret target and store this in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a>&#39;s CatchRetTargets vector. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file contains a machine function pass to insert a symbol before each valid catchret target and store this in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a>&#39;s CatchRetTargets vector.

This will be used to emit the table of valid targets used by EHCont Guard.

<SectionDefinition>
